EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Analyst Reports: Infrastructure and Ops in a Cloud-Native World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
In an era where technology leaders are measured on producing tangible business outcomes, their Infrastructure and Operations (I&O) teams are being challenged to address a wide range of issues from platform choice, to outdated processes that breed siloed teams and hinder innovation. In the age of cloud-native platforms such as Cloud Foundry and Kubernetes, tying business outcomes to I&O activities remains a top issue. In these two reports leading analyst firms Gartner and Forrester outline some of the most pressing challenges that I&O faces, and how to address them with a combination of cultural shifts, and platform choice.
Gartner: Top Challenges Facing I&O Leaders in 2018, and What to Do About Them <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/top-challenges-facing-io-leaders-in-2018-and-what-to-do-about-them?utm_source=email&utm_medium=cta&utm_campaign=analyst-top-challenges&utm_term=q218]]> I&O leaders are faced with significant challenges in 2018. If not addressed, these could have significant negative impacts on the business — and on their careers. The steps outlined in this research can improve I&O's capabilities to more effectively support the digital business.
Forrester: An I&O Pro's Guide to Platform-As-A-Service <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/an-io-pros-guide-to-platform-as-a-service?utm_source=email&utm_medium=cta&utm_campaign=io-pros-guide-to-paas&utm_term=q218]]> As I&O professionals enter platform-as-a-service (PaaS) conversations, the temptation is to discuss vendor selection. Success requires a deep understanding of the space and a strong working relationship with development teams; solving for self-service access or PaaS is impossible without mapping to developer wants and skills. This report navigates the three dimensions of the PaaS market, mapping PaaS technologies to various developer requirements.
Want more? Feel free to visit our resources <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports?utm_source=email&utm_medium=cta&utm_campaign=analyst-report-resources&utm_term=q218]]> section for additional reports.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
